title.rendered: STEDI TALL TYPE PUSH SWITCH TO SUIT MITSUBISHI

content.rendered:
Tall Type Push Switches to suit Mitsubishi

DETAILS

The STEDI Mitsubishi illuminated Push Buttons suit a number of Mitsubishi vehicles with OEM like fitment and finish.

KEY FEATURES

  • Blue LED Back Lighting
  • Upper Light is Active when Power is ON
  • Lower Light is Active when Dash Lights are ON
  • Laser Etched print ensure our print will never rub off with use
  • Rated at 3A on 12v
  • Excellent OEM matching design

COMPATIBLE Mitsubishi MAKES

  • Mitsubishi Eclipse | 2005 – 2012
  • Mitsubishi Endeavor | 2004 – 2008
  • Mitsubishi Endeavor | 2010 – 2011
  • Mitsubishi Galant | 2004 – 2011
  • Mitsubishi Pajero | 2002 – 2015
  • Mitsubishi Triton ML/MN | 2009 – 2015
  • Mitsubishi Challenger 2009-2015

Please ensure our switches are always wired through a fused relay.

SPECIFICATIONS

BACK LIGHT COLOUR Blue
SURFACE SIZE DIMENSIONS 35mmx17mm
RATED 3A @ 12v

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  •  1 x Tall Type Push Switch to suit Mitsubishi | Driving Lights
  •  1 x Green Connector with Wire Tails.
  •  1 x Wiring Diagram

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
